name: Assassin's Creed Valhalla: Wrath of the Druids
name_original: Assassin's Creed Valhalla: Wrath of the Druids
description:
Assassin's Creed Valhalla: Wrath of the Druids is an action game developed by Ubisoft Montreal. It came out on 13-05-2021. Ubisoft Entertainment published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Assassin's Creed Valhalla: Wrath of the Druids on Xbox One, PC, PlayStation 4 and Xbox Series S/X.
